com.isoterik.mgdx.input

Class GestureEventData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.input.GestureEventData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Pool.Poolable

    public class GestureEventData
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Pool.Poolable
    Contains information about a GestureEventData.GestureEvent. The amount of information contained is determined by the type of event that occurred

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GestureEventData.DataPool
      A pool for recycling instances of GestureEventData
      static class  GestureEventData.GestureEvent
      Types of gesture events

        The current distance between the two fingers after zoom

      • zoomFactor

        public float zoomFactor
        The ratio of initialZoomDistance to zoomDistance. You can multiply this with the current zoom of a camera to get the final zoom

      • sameEvent

        public boolean sameEvent(GestureEventData.GestureEvent secondEvent)
        Determines if the gesture event that this instance contains is similar to a given gesture event
        Parameters:
        secondEvent - the gesture event to compare against
        Returns:
        true it the two events are similar

      • sameEvent

        public boolean sameEvent(GestureEventData secondData)
        Determines if a given GestureEventData has the same event as this one. Note: only the events are compared, the comparison does not include other attributes
        Parameters:
        secondData - the given event data
        Returns:
        true it the two event data have similar events
